summary: The Department of Energy has a record of inadequate contract management, which can lead to increased acquisition costs and delays. This has raised concerns among congressional committees and others about how DOE plans for its acquisitions. We assessed how DOE implemented certain acquisition planning practices for some acquisitions. It wasn't always clear that DOE reviewed lessons learned from prior acquisitions, which is a way to...
title: Department of Energy Contracting: Actions Needed to Strengthen Certain Acquisition Planning Processes
